We want to put the largest digit in the highest place value. 

Which digit is the largest?

$\maroonD9$ is the largest digit, and we want to put it in the position with the highest place value.   

So $\maroonD9$ will be in the hundreds place: 
 $\maroonD{9}~\_~\_$.

Now we need to do the same thing with the next largest digit:  $\blueE4$.  

So $\blueE4$ goes in the tens place:  

$\maroonD{9}~\blueE4~\_$

The smallest digit is the $\purpleD2$.  The  $\purpleD2$ goes in the ones place:  

$\maroonD{9}\blueE4\purpleD2$
The greatest possible number we can make is $\maroonD{9}\blueE4\purpleD2$.
